pages.text: Oresome

The deposits of Ore found around your world are nothing new to you. What you have so far left out of consideration though are mineral veins, which contain a mix of different ores. Due to their wide and thin spread, the average miner can't find them, but a $(l:patchouli:heavy/excavator)special machine$() might be able to assist with that.

To begin looking for mineral veins, you'll want to craft some $(#007500)Survey Tools$(). By venturing out and using these tools on various blocks of natural soil, you can identify veins and find their approximate positions.

Each sample you take of the same vein gets you a more accurate read on what it contains and where it origi- nates. Note that veins can overlap, so you may find traces of different veins quite close to each other.
After narrowing down the type and position of the vein, use a $(#007500)Core Sample Drill$() to get a precise read on what veins are found at an exact position.

Supply the machine with power and rightclick it or use redstone to activate it. The drill consumes 40 Flux/t to then extract a core sample at its location which provides detailed information on the mineral vein.

The sample will not only tell you exactly what minerals are found there, including their relative presence, but also their individual $(#007500)saturation$(). A higher saturation means a higher chance for an excavator to fill its bucket wheel.

Sneak + rightclick a core sample to place it in the world, allowing you to read its position and information. Additionally, when placed, you can rightclick it with a map in order to mark its original position on there. $(br2)The following pages list every type of vein and the ores that can be retrieved from them.
$(l)Auricupride$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)75.00% Copper Ore $(br)25.00% Deepslate Gold Ore.
$(l)Beryl$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)70.00% Prismarine $(br)30.00% Deepslate Emerald Ore.
$(l)Bituminous Coal$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)80.00% Coal Ore $(br)20.00% Sulfur Dust.
$(l)Chalcopyrite$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)35.00% Deepslate Iron Ore $(br)35.00% Copper Ore $(br)30.00% Sulfur Dust.
$(l)Sphalerite$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Zinc Ore $(br)20.00% Sulfur Dust $(br)20.00% Iron Ore.
$(l)Cinnabar$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Deepslate Redstone Ore $(br)40.00% Sulfur Dust.
$(l)Galena$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)40.00% Deepslate Lead Ore $(br)40.00% Sulfur Dust $(br)20.00% Deepslate Silver Ore.
$(l)Ingeous Rock$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)30.00% Granite $(br)30.00% Diorite $(br)30.00% Andesite $(br)10.00% Obsidian.
$(l)Laterite$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)77.78% Deepslate Bauxite Ore $(br)22.22% Deepslate Iron Ore.
$(l)Pentlandite$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)35.00% Deepslate Iron Ore $(br)35.00% Deepslate Nickel Ore $(br)30.00% Sulfur Dust.
$(l)Silt$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)50.00% Clay $(br)30.00% Sand $(br)20.00% Gravel.
$(l)Uraninite$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)70.00% Deepslate Uranium Ore $(br)22.22% Deepslate Lead Ore.
$(l)Dimensional Vein$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Dimensional Shard $(br)40.00% Diamond Ore.
$(l)Tinnitus$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Zinc Ore $(br)40.00% Tin Ore.
$(l)Arcanum$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)40.00% Soulstone $(br)30.00% Lapis Lazuli $(br)20.00% Brilliance.
$(l)Cassiterite$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)100.00% Tin Ore.
$(l)Irdium Deposit$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Overworld. $(br)It consists of $(br2)100.00% Iridium Ore.
$(l)Mephic Quarzite$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Nether. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Nether Quartz Ore $(br)20.00% Nether Gold Ore $(br)20.00% Sulfur Dust.
$(l)Archaic Digsite$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Nether. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Gravel $(br)40.00% Ancient Debris.
$(l)Ancient Cobalt$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Nether. $(br)It consists of $(br2)70.00% Cobalt Ore $(br)30.00% Ancient debris.
$(l)Blazing Shards$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Nether. $(br)It consists of $(br2)50.00% Blazing Quartz Ore $(br)30.00% Magma Blocks $(br)20.00% Dimensional Shards.
$(l)Ignis Quartz$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Nether. $(br)It consists of $(br2)40.00% Blazing Quartz Ore $(br)30.00% Nether Quartz $(br)30.00% Rose Quartz.
$(l)Ferrous Dairy$() is a mineral vein that can be found on the Moon. $(br)It consists of $(br2)50.00% Moon Cheese Ore $(br)30.00% Moon Iron Ore $(br)20.00% Ice shard ore.
$(l)Frozen Cheese$() is a mineral vein that can be found on the Moon. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Ice Shard Ore $(br)40.00% Moon Cheese Ore.
$(l)Moonsteel$() is a mineral vein that can be found on the Moon. $(br)It consists of $(br2)70.00% Desh Ore $(br)30.00% Moon Iron Ore.
$(l)Crystalline Ice$() is a mineral vein that can be found on Mars. $(br)It consists of $(br2)50.00% Ice Shard Ore $(br)30.00% Permafrost $(br)20.00% Martian Diamond Ore.
$(l)Martian Debris$() is a mineral vein that can be found on Mars. $(br)It consists of $(br2)70.00% Ostrum Ore $(br)30.00% Ancient Debris.
$(l)Osterrian$() is a mineral vein that can be found on Mars. $(br)It consists of $(br2)50.00% Martian Iron Ore $(br)40.00% Ostrum Ore $(br)10.00% Ancient Debris.
$(l)Calorum$() is a mineral vein that can be found on Venus. $(br)It consists of $(br2)40.00% Calorite Ore $(br)40.00% Venusian Gold Ore $(br)20.00% Venusian Coal Ore.
$(l)Diamondite$() is a mineral vein that can be found on Venus. $(br)It consists of $(br2)50.00% Calorite Ore $(br)30.00% Venusian Coal Ore $(br)20.00% Venusian Diamond Ore.
$(l)Shining Coal$() is a mineral vein that can be found on Venus. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Venusian Coal Ore $(br)30.00% Venusian Gold Ore $(br)10.00% Venusian Diamond Ore.
$(l)Blue Carbon$() is a mineral vein that can be found on Glacio. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Glacian Coal Ore $(br)40.00% Glacian Lapis Ore.

$(l)Cryo ferra$() is a mineral vein that can be found on Glacio. $(br)It consists of $(br2)40.00% Glacian Ice shards $(br)30.00% Glacian Iron Ore $(br)20.00% Glacian Coal Ore $(br)10.00% Glacian Lapis Ore.
$(l)Glacial Ore$() is a mineral vein that can be found on Glacio. $(br)It consists of $(br2)40.00% Glacian Ice Shards $(br)30.00% Glacian Iron Ore $(br)30.00% Glacian Copper ore.
$(l)Copprus$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Undergarden. $(br)It consists of $(br2)50.00% Cloggrum Ore $(br)30.00% Deep Iron Ore $(br)20.00% Deep Gold Ore.
$(l)Ferrous Aurum$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Undergarden. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Deep Iron Ore $(br)40.00% Deep Gold Ore.
$(l)Polished Coprolite$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Undergarden. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Deep Cloggrum Ore $(br)30.00% Deep Utherium Ore $(br)10.00% Deep Diamond Ore.
$(l)Utheric Carbon$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Undergarden. $(br)It consists of $(br2)40.00% Deep Utherium Ore $(br)40.00% Deep Coal Ore $(br)20.00% Deep Diamond Ore.
$(l)Ferrofrost$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Undergarden. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Shiver Iron Ore $(br)40.00% Froststeel.
$(l)Frosty Utherium$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Undergarden. $(br)It consists of $(br2)50.00% Froststeel $(br)50.00% Shiver Utherium Ore.
$(l)Glacial Coprolite$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Undergarden. $(br)It consists of $(br2)40.00% Shiver Cloggrum Ore $(br)40.00% Froststeel $(br)20.00% Shiver Coal Ore.
$(l)Shivercoal$() is a mineral vein that can be found in the Undergarden. $(br)It consists of $(br2)60.00% Shiver Coal Ore $(br)30.00% Froststeel $(br)10.00% Shiver Diamond Ore.
